title: digambaram shivam
sahitya:
digambaram shivam dIna janAvanam

anupallavi

 mrga dhrtakaram vENuvanEsham nigamAgama sAram nirIshvaram nikhilalOka nAtham

caraNam 1

 sura sEvita 
caraNam 2
 taruNam nija sukha dAyaka 
caraNam 3
 sharaNyam 
vara harikEshapura sadanam vandE hari vinutam ambikA nAtham
